item.title: Pro-Bitcoin El Salvador President Bukele Is Buying The Dip In Gold Too, Just In Case
item.description: This is the second time El Salvador has bought gold since 1990, following an IMF-mandated acquisition of nearly 14,000 troy ounces in 2025.

item.title: Starlink Phone 'Not Out Of The Question,’ Says Elon Musk — But Whatever Happened To The Tesla Phone?
item.description: A Tesla phone never made it to the market, but Musk is now talking about a Starlink phone.

item.title: OpenAI To IPO In Q4? Retail Frenzy Builds Around AI Giant Backed By Microsoft And Nvidia
item.description: OpenAI has started talks with investment bankers and is strengthening its finance team.

item.title: OpenAI To IPO In Q4? Retail Frenzy Builds Around AI Giant Backed By Microsoft And Nvidia
item.description: OpenAI has started talks with investment bankers and is strengthening its finance team.

item.title: MSTR, BMNR, GEMI Get Knocked Down Amid Bitcoin Crash As Retail Chatter More Than Doubles
item.description: Bitcoin fell to $81,000 for the first time since November, dragging crypto-linked equities lower.
